testsuite.name: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user

testcase.classname: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user
testcase.name: Should fail when site is false

testcase.classname: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user
testcase.name: Should fail when duz is undefined

testcase.classname: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user
testcase.name: Should fail when no author on the comment

testcase.classname: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user
testcase.name: Should fail when no duz on the comment for the logged in user site

testcase.classname: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user
testcase.name: Should fail when no user IDs do not match

testcase.classname: Writeback utility for checking comment authors against the logged in user
testcase.name: Should pass when sites and user IDs match
